title: Hazelnut gnocchi with girolles, crisp fried duck eggs and parmesan
ingredients: 225g/8oz mashed potato (without milk or butter added)
50g/2oz hazelnuts, skins removed, roasted and chopped, plus 8 whole hazelnuts, to serve
100g/3½oz type '00' flour, plus extra for dusting
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
200ml/7fl oz hot brown chicken stock or vegetable stock
